column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia esuon no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia enum no
column4: bosoom no ne dadu no
column5: na Israel mpanyimfo no mu bi baa dɛ wɔreba EWURADZE hɔ ebisa

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column8: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Aso hom aba mo hɔ ebisa? Metse ase yi
column9: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse hom remmba mo hɔ ebisa ara da."

column2: "Onyimpa ba
column3: aso ibobu hɔn atsɛn
column4: aso ibobu hɔn atsɛn? Ma wonhu hɔn egyanom hɔn atantandze;"

column2: "na se hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Da a mesaan mu miyii Israel
column4: na memaa me nsa do kyerɛɛ Jakob fi asefo no
column5: na memaa wohun me wɔ Egypt asaase do no
column6: ber a memaa me nsa do kyerɛɛ hɔn
column8: Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no;"

column2: "da no na memaa me nsa do kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ medze hɔn rifir edzi efi Egypt asaase do makɔ asaase bi a makɛsera mahwɛ mama hɔn a numfonsu na ewo pem do a ɔyɛ asaase nyina enyimnyam no no do:"
"na mesee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mu nyimpa biara ntotow n'enyiwa mu atantandze no ngugu
column4: na mma hom mmfa Egypt abosom no nngu homho fi; emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wɔtseew mo do etua na wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie emi; hɔn mu nyimpa biara anntow n'enyiwa mu atantandze no enngu
column4: eso wɔammpow Egypt abosom no: nna mesee dɛ mubohue m'ebufuhyew megu hɔn do
column5: medze mewie m'ebufuw wɔ hɔn do wɔ Egypt asaase mu."

column2: "Na me dzin ntsi meyɛe mma no ho eenngu fi wɔ amanaman a wɔtse hɔn mu no hɔn enyiwa mu
column3: hɔn a memaa wohun me wɔ hɔn enyiwa mu
column4: dɛ miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi memaa wofii Egypt asaase do
column3: na medze hɔn mebaa sar no do."

column2: "Na medze m'ahyɛdze memaa hɔn
column3: na mekyerɛɛ hɔn m'atsɛmbudze a sɛ dasanyi yɛ a
column4: ɔbɛtsena ase wɔ mu no."

column2: "Nkyii so medze m'ahomgyenda so memaa hɔn
column3: ma aayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ada menye hɔn ntamu
column4: ama woeehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hɔn ho no."

column2: "Na mbom Israel fifo tseew mo do etua wɔ sar no do: wɔannantsew m'ahyɛdze do
column3: na wɔpoow m'atsɛmbudze a
column4: sɛ ɔdasanyi yɛ a ɔbɛtsena ase wɔ mu no; na woguu m'ahomgyenda no ho fi kɛsenara: nna mesee dɛ mubohue m'ebufuhyew megu hɔn do wɔ sar no do

column2: "Na me dzin ntsi meyɛe amma no ho eenngu fi wɔ amanaman a hɔn enyi tuae ma medze hɔn fiir edzi no hɔn enyiwa mu."
"Bio so memaa me nsa do wɔ hɔn do wɔ sar no do
column3: dɛ meremmfa hɔn mmba asaase a ɔpem numfonsu na ewo a ɔyɛ asaase nyina enyimnyam a medze memaa hɔn no no do;"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔpoow m'atsɛmbudze
column3: na wɔannantsew m'ahyɛdze mu
column4: na woegu m'ahomgyenda ho fi: osiandɛ hɔn akoma dzii hɔn abosom ekyir."

column2: "Naaso muhun hɔn mbɔbɔr ma mannsɛɛ hɔn
column3: eso mennkum hɔn ase koraa wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na mekaa kyerɛɛ hɔn mba wɔ sar no do
column3: dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnantsew hom egyanom ahyɛdze no mu
column5: eso mma hom nndzi hɔn atsɛmbudze no do
column6: eso mma hom mmfa hɔn abosom nngu homho fi:"

column2: "emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn; hom nnantsew m'ahyɛdze do
column3: na hom ndzi m'atsɛmbudze do
column4: na hom nyɛ:"

column2: "na hom nyɛ m'ahomgyenda no krɔnkrɔn na wɔbɛyɛ menye hom ntamu asɛnkyerɛdze
column3: ama hom eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na mba no so tseew mo do etua; wɔannantsew m'ahyɛdze mu
column3: eso woenndzi m'atsɛmbudze no do annyɛ
column4: dza sɛ dasanyi yɛ a
column5: ɔbɛtsena ase wɔ mu no; woguu m'ahomgyenda no ho fi: nna mesee dɛ mubohue m'ebufuhyew megu hɔn do
column6: medze mewie m'ebufuw wɔ hɔn do wɔ sar no no do."

column2: "Naaso misiankaa me nsa
column3: na me dzin ntsi meyɛe ma no ho enngu fi wɔ amanaman a medze hɔn fiir edzi wɔ hɔn enyim no enyim."

column2: "Nkyii so memaa me nsa do kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ sar no do
column3: dɛ mobɔbɔ hɔn ahotse amanaman no mu
column4: na mabɔ hɔn apetse nkurow nkurow do;"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔannyɛ m'atsɛmbudze
column3: mbom wɔpoow m'ahyɛdze
column4: na woguu m'ahomgyenda ho fi na hɔn enyi dzii hɔn egyanom abosom no ekyir."

column2: "Nkyii so bio mehyɛɛ hɔn ahyɛdze a onnye
column3: na atsɛmbudze a wɔrenntsena ase wɔ mu;"

column2: "na muguu hɔn ho fi wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn ayɛyɛdze no mu
column3: wɔ dɛ wɔmaa dza obue wotoa ano nyina oduaa gya mu
column4: ama maasɛɛ hɔnara ma woeehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: onyimpa ba
column4: kasa kyerɛ Israel fifo na se dɛ
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Iyi mu so na hom egyanom akasa mo ho kasa bɔn dɛ wɔato mbra etsia me no."

column2: "Na minyae medze hɔn mebaa asaase a memaa me nsa do dɛ medze mebɛma hɔn no no do no
column3: nna hɔn enyi bɔ koko a ɔkrɔn biara
column4: na dɔtɔ wusuww biara do a
column6: na hɔ na wɔdze hɔn ehiyi afɔrbɔdze no bae
column7: hɔ ara so na woyii hɔn hua huanhuam
column8: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn ɔnom afɔr wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Nna mesee hɔn dɛ
column3: Bea sorɔnsorɔm a hom kɔ hɔ yi
column4: ase nye dɛn? Dɛm ntsi na wɔtoo no dzin Bama araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi se Israel fie dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: aso hom egyanom akwan do na hom gu homho fi
column4: na hɔn atantandze ekyir na hom dzi dze gor ndwamangor yi?"

column2: "Sɛ hom dze hom ayɛyɛdze ba
column3: na hom dze hom mba bɔ ɔhyew afɔr a
column4: hom dze hom abosom nyinara gu homho fi dze bodu ndɛ da yi. Ao Israel fie
column5: aso hom bɛba mo hɔ ebisa? Metse ase yi

column2: "Dza ɔba hom adwen mu no ɔrennyɛ hɔ koraa; wɔ dɛ hom ka dɛ
column3: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛ amanaman no
column4: dɛ nkurow nkurow do ebusua ebusua no na yɛasom dua na ɔbo."

column2: "Metse ase yi
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column4: ampaara medze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen
column6: na ebufuhyew a woehue egu mibedzi hom do hen:"

column2: "na mibeyi hom efi aman mu
column3: na maboaboa hom ano efi nkurow nkurow a mabɔ hom apetse hɔ no mu
column4: medze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen

column2: "na medze hom bɛba aman no hɔn sar no do
column3: na mubobu hom atsɛn wɔ hɔ enyim tua enyim."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ menye hom egyanom dzii wɔ Egypt asaase sar do no
column3: dɛmara so na menye hom beyi atsɛn
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Na mebɛma hom edua abaa no ase
column3: na medze hom aba ahyɛmu no ne nkyekyeree no mu;"

column2: "na mibeyiyi hom mu etuatsewfo
column3: na hɔn a wɔto mbra tsia me no; medze hɔn befi asaase a wɔakɛyɛ hɔ no amamforafo no aba
column4: naaso wɔrennhɛn Israel asaase do: na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Israel fie
column3: hom dze
column4: mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom nkɔ
column6: na n'ekyir no so sɛ hom enntsie me a: na me dzin krɔnkrɔn no dze hom rennda ho mmfa hom ayɛyɛdze na hom abosom nngu ho fi bio."

column2: "Na me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn
column3: Israel bepɔw a ɔkrɔn no no do
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column7: wɔbɔsom me wɔ asaase no do: hɔ na wɔbɔsɔ m'enyi
column8: na hɔ na mibebisa hom afɔrbɔdze
column9: na hom ayɛyɛdze mu nduadzewakan no

column2: "Hom bɔsɔ m'enyi dɛ hua huanhuam
column3: ber a mibeyi hom efi aman no mu
column4: na maboaboa hom ano mefi nkurow nkurow a wɔabɔ hom apetse do no do; na mo ho bɛtsew wɔ hom mu wɔ amanaman no enyim."

column2: "Na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column3: ber a medze hom bɛba Israel asaase do
column4: kurow a memaa me nsa do dɛ medze bɛma hom egyanom no do."

column2: "Na hɔ na hom bɛkaakaa hom abrabɔ
column3: na hom nyɛe nyina a hom dze egu homho fi no; na hom ho bɛyɛ hom nkɔw wɔ hom enyi do wɔ hom mbusu a hom abɔ no nyina ntsi."

column2: "Na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column3: ber a osian me dzin ntsi ma menye hom edzi
column4: na nnyɛ dɛ osian hom akwan bɔn no
column5: na hom ndzeyɛɛ a aprɔw no ntsi

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column7: na ma w'asɛm nsosɔw pomu afamu
column8: na hyɛ pomu afamu haban no no kwaa no do nkɔm;"

column2: "na se pomu afamu kwaa no dɛ
column3: Tsie EWURADZE n'asɛm; Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column4: mobɔsɔ gya wɔ wo mu
column5: na ɔbɛhyew wo mu dua momon biara
column6: na dua wui biara: gyaframee a ɔdzɛɛw framfram no orunndum
column7: na ɔbɛhyew enyim nyina fi pomu afamu akɛpem kwaamu afamu."

column2: "Na adasa nyina bohu dɛ emi EWURADZE na masɔ; orunndum."
"Nna mesee dɛ
column3: Ao EWURADZE Nyankopɔn! Wɔka wɔ mo ho dɛ
column4: Ana nnyɛ mbɛ ara na obubu a?"
